Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute at Ewing/93rd
ShortDescription: 30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Ewing, South Chicago and Ewing due to, street blockage near Ewing/93rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ewing, South Chicago and Ewing due to, street blockage near Ewing/93rd.

Allow extra travel time.
